Aboutme.education.quote: Determination and the constant pursuit of knowledge are the pillars of success
Aboutme.unesa.quote: Investing in knowledge always yields the best returns

experience.position: Corporal of the Marine Infantry Corps
experience.experience.description: From 2016 to 2024, I learned valuable lessons in leadership, resilience, and camaraderie while participating in training exercises and real missions. I was assigned to the Data Processing Sector (SPD), where I worked with maintenance and infrastructure, improving my technical skills and contributing to the unit's operational efficiency.
experience.honors: I was honored with a Letter of Merit from the Brazilian Navy for my professional conduct during my service. I also received the following decorations:
experience.honor1: Splendor of the Heroes of Peace
experience.essencia_life.description: I developed significant skills as a network administrator in my free time while gaining hands-on experience as an encapsulator.
